basics.name: Ali Efe Karagül
basics.label: Computer Engineering Student
basics.summary: Computer engineering student with more than 5 years of programming experience. Combines deep understanding of programming concepts with creative problem solving skills. Strong passion for development projects. Capable of adapting easily to new technologies and programming environments.

work.name: Huawei
work.summary: Summer internship at the Network Technologies department.

work.name: Map.
work.summary: Non-professional collective that focuses on development projects from many fields.

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

awards.title: 3rd Place in Project Competition
awards.summary: Won third place in a project competition with a novel steganography method.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
